0:
nodeAffinity:
  preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 60
      preference:
        matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
              - amd64
              - i386
              - i686
              - x86

for i in $(seq 1 180); do
  test -f /host/etc/cni/net.d/10-calico.conflist && exit 0
  sleep 1
done
exit 1

/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/prometheus-community.github.io-helm-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

0:
[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

#!/bin/sh
npm install --save homebridge-dummy@latest
npm install --save homebridge-myq@latest
npm install --save homebridge-nest@latest
npm install --save homebridge-orbit-irrigation@latest
npm install --save homebridge-tplink-smarthome@latest
npm install --save -g homebridge-camera-ui@latest
